p.s: Sweat was running down his face as he walked up Pinon Drive.
Why in god's name did it have to be so hot on this damn day?
He had been waiting for hours at the labor exchange and when he finally was offered work the sun was standing at the highest point possible.
He had a headache, his legs were exhausted from the long walk and worst of all he had nothing to drink.
He kept on walking and was crossing one of those huge lawns to insert a flier underneath the door when he heard a sudden call.
He stopped walking and looked around to see who it was.
He spotted a man walking up the street and wondered whether the man was talking to him or not.
José just stood there on a rich man's lawn, sweating and waiting for the white man to pass by.
The man was suddenly walking faster and then, eventhougheven though they looked all the same to him: evil, white and eyes filled with disgust as soon as they saw him, he recognized him.
Yes, that was it!
It was the man he had seen up in the canyon!
The man stopped and said I said, can I help you?.
EventhoughEven thoughJosé noticed the ringy sounding undertone in the man's voice he chose to ignore it.
Help me? he answered.
Sure, sure, hombre, you can help meJosé snickered and noticed then how red the man was turning and how all the muscles in his face formed an angry looking mask.
What's happening, man? he asked and the man responded I want to know what you think you're doing here.This is private property.You don't belong here.
Seriously?
José thought, not again.
Why can't these people understand that I will be near them when they hire me?
For Christ's sake was it that hard to understand?
His annoyed thoughts were interrupted when the man suddenly grabbed his wrist and shouted I'm talking to you!.
That was enough!
He was doing a job he was hired to do and that was it.
José freed himself and spat between the white man's feet.
The man looked as if he would burst any second and threatened José with calling the police.
Do I really have to prove everything, he thought.
Ragefully taking out these damn fliers and shoving them in the hands of the white man he was able to prove himself falsely accused.
He couldn't take these white pigs anymore.
Letting him do the dirty work and then accusing them of stealing.
Idiots!
